snippet.title: Pilot draws Boeing plane over US with flight path
snippet.content:

Pilot draws Boeing plane over US with flight path. Image: Flightradar24
Share
A CHEEKY pilot decided to have a little fun during an engine testing exercise of a Boeing 787-800 Dreamliner, drawing a picture in the sky with the flight path. The Boeing pilot was putting the new aircraft through an endurance test to ensure it was passenger-ready when it became apparent that's not all that was happening. The pilot was also drawing a virtual plane with the flight pattern over the United States. The self-portrait was documented by air traffic tracker Flightradar24, who published it on Twitter.
